description:
The jungle is full of sparkling jewels - and it’s in High Definition now!
 
If you like swapping jewels, you will love Jungle Jewels! 

Jungle Jewels combines an incredibly addictive gameplay, 4 different game modes and probably the most beautiful jewel artwork you’ve ever seen. This game is highly recommended for all fans of puzzle and match three games. 

MATCH THREE PUZZLE FUN ON YOUR TOUCHPAD
Jungle Jewels is a beautifully illustrated match three puzzler. Swap jewels vertically or horizontally to form groups of three or more like-colored jewels. 

FOUR GAME MODES 
Play four levels in the CLASSIC mode, and try to beat the clock. Try to reach higher scores and multipliers in SCORE ATTACK mode, or just sit back, relax and match some jewels in RELAXATION mode and ENDLESS mode. 

KEY FEATURES OF JUNGLE JEWELS 
★ Hours of match-3 puzzle gaming! 
★ Beautifully illustrated artwork with great attention to detail 
★ Exciting match three gameplay taken to a new dimension 
★ 4 compelling game modes: Classic, Relaxation, Score Attack, and Endless 
★ Enjoy a great dynamic soundtrack that gets more and more exciting each level
